title: Caitlin's Guardian Angel
description: Under his wing...The assignment - protecting a witness to a brutal murder - was the toughest of Detective Graham Redhawk's career. Because the witness was Caitlin Cassidy, the woman who'd long go decided that a half-Navajo renegade like him wasn't good enough to spend her life with...At the same time, he was entangled in a bitter custody battle for his adopted son. And his only hope of winning was a marriage - in name only - to this woman he couldn't stop loving...
author: Marie Ferrarella
